message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with point cloud denoising, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of tensor decomposition, which falls under the scope of cs.GR (Graphics). The use of hard thresholding for noise removal suggests the involvement of machine learning techniques, which is covered by cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves numerical optimization, which is covered by cs.NA (Numerical Analysis). Finally, the paper involves the evaluation of the proposed algorithm, which falls under the scope of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
